title: Vietnam Pipemaker Poised for Growth as Parent SCG Eyes Deals
description: Vietnam’s largest listed plastic pipe maker Binh Minh Plastics JSC, backed by Thailand’s Siam Cement Pcl, is positioned to ride a prolonged construction upswing in a growing economy, underscoring the nation’s rising importance to its parent’s regional expansion plans, according to Binh Minh Chief Executive Officer Niwat Athiwattananont.
content: Vietnam’s largest listed plastic pipe maker Binh Minh Plastics JSC, backed by Thailand’s Siam Cement Pcl, is positioned to ride a prolonged construction upswing in a growing economy, underscoring the nation’s rising importance to its parent’s regional expansion plans, according to Binh Minh Chief Executive Officer Niwat Athiwattananont.
